name: sfpwowerscript-promoteunlockedpackage-task
description: This taks is used to promote an unlocked package before installing into production, This task is part of DX@Scale/SFPowerscripts
author: dxatscale@accenture.com

inputs.name: package
inputs.label: Name of the package to be promoted
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the package to be promoted

inputs.name: aritfactDir
inputs.label: Path to the directory where artifacts are downloaded
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the artifact directory where the artifacts are downloaded, If not provided, the default values will be automatically used

inputs.name: projectDirectory
inputs.label: Project Directory, if not using artifact directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The project directory should contain a sfdx-project.json for this command to succeed

inputs.name: devhub_alias
inputs.label: Alias/Username of the devhub
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the alias of the devhub previously authenticated, default value is HubOrg if using the Authenticate Devhub task

inputs.name: skip_on_missing_artifact
inputs.label: Skip If no artifact is found
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do not fail the task if attached artifact is missing,Use it to skip artifact installation by removing attached artifacts
